title: 05/28/21 DPS Hour 3 Jeff Van Gundy
itunes:title: 05/28/21 DPS Hour 3 Jeff Van Gundy
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, an old friend and colleague of Dan's calls in for an impromptu sports chat. Later, ESPN NBA color commentator and analyst Jeff Van Gundy joins the show to discuss the latest story lines emerging from the NBA playoffs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
